name: Mt Tullo
description:
Time to take a dive!

- dodge your way through randomly generated chutes

- collect rings to get more points 

- unlock additional characters

- rank on online leaderboards

Controls:

WASD to move about

Hold space to dive faster

Music:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Tintamare/st_1479/Tintamare_-_pilogue_Lo-Fi_-...

Game-A-Month-Athon 9/12

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where I've set out to create a bite-size game each month! 

 March 2022
